text:
@TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump @LaraLeaTrump @KevinMcCarthy Trump wants his name on the front of the stimulus checks, so that we’ll know of his attempt to buy our silence about the death of Americans.
$1200 / 60000 Coronavirus deaths, works out to 2 cents per death payout. That’s a real bargain Mr. President.
